channel.title: Solved
channel.description: ok, so i made a shop and added the items in shops.cfg. and then i added the trade click to open the shop in actionhandler. so when i ::npc and spawn my shopkeeper. shop opens up and works and my items i added in shops.cfg are in there. but then when i wanna permenantly add the npc to game. i write him down in spawn-config and when i save compile and and rerun source. hes not there. what am i doing wrong?

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @valdez250 valdez250
item.description:
@valdez250 wrote:

ok, so i made a shop and added the items in shops.cfg. and then i added the trade click to open the shop in actionhandler. so when i ::npc and spawn my shopkeeper. shop opens up
and works and my items i added in shops.cfg are in there. but then when i wanna permenantly add the npc to game. i write him down in spawn-config and when i save compile and and rerun source. hes not there. what am i doing wrong?
